description.full: Asterix and Obelix face a daunting challenge: win all the Olympic events to ridicule Caesar's son, Brutus, who is in possession of a terrible secret weapon… he has found a way to gather to him all the Roman legionaries in the Universe…
description.short: Asterix and Obelix face a daunting challenge: win all the Olympic events to ridicule Caesar's son, Brutus, who is in possession of a terrible secret weapon… he has found a way to gather to him all the Roman legionaries in the Universe…
